name: UVO
description:
Uvo fell in an unknown place. And it looks like there is someone else here. Now Uvo is even more confused.

The game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 and the theme was 'It is not real'.

I did not have enough time to implement full-fledged puzzle-mechanics (which should have been), so I left everything as it is, and turned it into a small sketch about illusory love (and maybe an entire life).

INPUT

A, D / arrows = move

Space = jump

CREDITS
